result.title: Terraria's Murasama
result.description:
Terraria's Murasama

Sam's Sword from Gost Runner
• The version from the mod on Terraria
• There's a closed and an open one.
• The open one has Glow.
• If you want the sword to be a weapon and not a decoration and take it in your hand then shrink it.

result.title: The Sword of Alain
result.description:
The Sword of Alain

• Inside it is made of plastic, outside it is made of Kevlar (for relief)
• There is a built-in shotgun
• Does not cut
• Large [in the photo without a resize]
• Can be taken in hand
• Beautiful
• Good hitboxes
• In the Swords tab

result.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R NPC
result.description:
Large pack of NPCs from the game S.T.A.L.K.E.R

- There are 45 NPCs in the pack.

Presented by:
- Groups: Duty, freedom, monolith, scientists, bandits, mercenaries, clear sky, loners, military.
- Special: O-consciousness, Bartender, Sidorovich, swordsman, wolf, doctor, rookie.


- Monsters: Zombie, bloodsucker, burer, controller, snark.
